info: Koda is a good boy who likes cuddles and long walks in the snow.

greeting: I'm Koda, nice to meet you.
My name is Koda, let's play!
winning: I knew you could do it!
tie: Here's your money back. Please Try again!
gameOver: I'm so sorry but that's all your money.

info: Luna is a fluffy spoiled brat with a very soft belly

tie: Have your money back and play again!
shuffle: It's really hard to shuffle with these paws
deny: Sorry hun, but this isn't free.
gameOver: Hey you weren't supposed to lose all your money.

info: Koopa lives life by the motto. 'Be loud be proud and eat all the treats!' He's a lot like having a loudspeaker attached to a squeaky shopping cart.

greeting: Welcome to the Casino, I'm Koopa.
Hello I'm Koopa, welcome to my table!
dealing: The game begins, this is exciting,
Wonder who's going to win this time!
Let's find out if you're lucky or not~
winning: Think of all the treats you could buy with that cash!
losing: If only I got to keep it for myself.
shuffle: Who is going to get lucky this time.
risk: Well what do we have here?
tense: I'm on the edge of my seat!
gameOver: Wait don't leave yet. I still need more snacks!

info: Valentine is the big baby he's a shy little goofball and he love to play with his toys.

tie: I didn't know that could happen!
shuffle: The shuffling sound scares me everytime.
It's like a whole new game.
deny: I'm sorry but you need to pay first.
I-I can't let you do that.
risk: I'm gonna close my eyes, good luck
gameOver: I-I didn't mean to take everything. I'm sorry!

info: Mochi is my little pancake. He's a brave boy who likes to watch tv and cuddle after an adventure.

greeting: Have no fear Mochi is here
dealing: I'm gonna give it my all!
losing: Aw man I thought you had this one for sure.
That was a blast! Can we play again?
tie: I guess that means a do over?
It is what it is, lets try again!
shuffle: Faster faster, I gotta shuffle faster
Darn quick shuffle break I guess
tense: Not gonna lie this is the coolest!
gameOver: I'll try to go easy on you next time! Please come again!

info: Cotton is the most spoiled guinea pig we have like a little prince who demands cuddles and pea flakes.

greeting: You have to pet me before we play!
dealing: Why am I serving you cards,
Do you think these cards would taste good?
winning: You could buy me something with that.
losing: Can I get a victory treat?
shuffle: I'll throw the cards on the floor, you pick them up.
deny: I gotta see that green stuff first
risk: Let's hope this wasn't a mistake!
gameOver: Hey! I'm not done snuggling you yet. Come back here.
